txt.en: During their attack on the lumber-yard, the Orcs captured many of the workers. You should attempt to free them.
During their attack on the lumber-yard, the Orcs captured many of the workers. You should free the workers as quickly as you can.
You have freed all of the captured lumber-yard workers.
During their attack on the lumber-yard, the Orcs captured many of the workers. You should attempt to free them.
'How could I possibly repay you? Thank you.'
During the Orc-attack on the lumber-yard, several of the workers were captured.
'I thought that I would never see my family again...thank you.'
